Paragraph: Further studies are needed to explore tissue bupivacaine levels of propofol in medialipid and adapt these results to clinical practice .

1. Bupivacaine: This is a local anesthetic used to numb areas of the body for surgical procedures.
2. Propofol: This is a short-acting general anesthetic used to induce and maintain anesthesia during surgery.

Therefore, the "chemical" entities in the paragraph are bupivacaine and propofol.
